title: can anyone help me id these two fonts?
content:
Hey guys,

can anyone help me id these two fonts?

Thanks a lot.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3177212098481\_VgITRKKt\_l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/typophile.com/files/3177212098481_VgITRKKt_l.jpg) | 27 KB |
| [Screen Shot 2013-04-20 at 8.15.05 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-20%20at%208.15.05%20PM.png) | 12.13 KB |
author: nhood

comments.content:
Hello  
For LINEN IS IN similar:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Harriet-Display-Bold-okay-type.font?text=LINEN...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Harriet-Display-Bold-okay-type.font?text=LINEN%20IS%20IN "http://www.whatfontis.com/Harriet-Display-Bold-okay-type.font?text=LINEN%20IS%20IN")  
For Citizen KANE:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Carisma-Inline-castletype.font?text=CITIZEN%20...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Carisma-Inline-castletype.font?text=CITIZEN%20KANE "http://www.whatfontis.com/Carisma-Inline-castletype.font?text=CITIZEN%20KANE")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!

‘LINEN IS IN’ is Chronicle Display Condensed Bold or Chronicle Deck Condensed Bold.  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100031&p...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100031&path=head "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100031&path=head")

Can't find a font that could match perfectly both "CITIZEN" and "KANE" at the same time. Here are some candidates that could fit these letterings in 2 different widths without squooshing it: [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100013) (mainly redrawing /K plus some very little adjustments), [Champion Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100002), [Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be) (mainly tweaking /Z), [Rama Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rama-gothic) (/Z and /K to be tweaked), [Block Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010130/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr) (/Z)

Hey guys, i really appreciate your help with this.

It looks like you've figured it out. Thanks!
